p: This impurity group consists of compounds with a head-tail structure, such as the perfluorinated molecule chains that end in an HCF 2 group. These compounds (called 1-H-perfluoroalkanes) are initial members of a homologous series of perfluoroalkylalkanes (also known in the literature as partially fluorinated compounds or FALK or RFRH. 11 â€“ 13).
